Key Match Events: Brandon Glover took 3 wickets for 24 runs in the 16th over, dismissing David Miller and Wayne Parnell in the same over, and caught the attention of the Netherlands team with his sensational catch of David Miller off Roelof van der Merwe's bowling
Pre-Game Insights: Glover had first caught the attention of Ryan Campbell, the then-head coach of Netherlands, in 2019, and was impressed enough to convince him to move to the Netherlands and use his Dutch passport to start a career there
Post-Match Reflections: Glover said that they were just waiting for that complete performance and were happy with how they've gone, and that it shows hard work pays off
Miscellaneous Highlights: There is a strong South African influence in Netherlands' squad, with Stephan Myburgh, Colin Ackermann, Brandon Glover, and Roelof van der Merwe all having South African backgrounds
Others: Glover's shift to Netherlands paid off immediately, as he emerged as the joint-highest wicket-taker in T20I cricket in 2019, and his rise promises new beginnings for Netherlands
